item.description:
Welcome: To our Haunted Volleyball Bash!

When: October 3rd (Saturday) Starts @2:PM,

Where: Chichester, NH - (Email me for address)

Who: Your Hosts; Geana & Scott - additional guests/victims are welcome

Why: Play Volleyball near an authentic cemetery (better watch your balls!) or just socialize w/friends

Wear: Costumes are encouraged but not required, consider the encumbrance if playing volleyball or being chased

Wine & Dine: BYOB, Red Meats & Jell-O shots supplied, shared food contributions & chairs much appreciated

Whatever: DJ'd by "Rebelstien's Ride" (aka MBaum) Volleyball, BBQ, Bon Fire next to pond, Camping overnight for tents & RV's. Sleep next to a grave, I dare ya!! Ahh Ha ha har...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the white Camper/Van DJ station
item.name: - Haunted Volleyball Bash -
